mean_cn: n. 斯多葛学派哲学家，禁欲主义者，坚守克己之人；  adj. 斯多葛派的，禁欲主义的
mean_en: showing no emotion especially when something bad is happening
word_etyma: stoic →坚忍克己之人，来自古希腊斯多噶哲学派，主张以苦为乐
short_phrase: The stoic woman doesn't listen to the angry man.
sentence: Her stoic calm was proof against his worst insults.
sentence_trans: 她斯多葛式的冷静使她面对他最恶劣的侮辱时不为所动。
